name: VCA/Multiplier
description: Voltage multiplier algorithm that can function as a VCA. Uses a common CV input to multiply voltages on other channels. Supports typical VCA (clamp to 0V) or four-quadrant multiplier behavior.

specifications.name: Channels
specifications.description: The number of bus channels to process.

parameters.name: Input
parameters.description: The common input bus (CV for multiplication).

parameters.name: Clamp to 0V
parameters.description: Clamps common input to 0V (VCA mode) or allows negative values (4-quadrant multiplier mode).

parameters.name: Divider
parameters.description: Sets the scaling of the input CV that corresponds to unity gain.

parameters.name: Input
parameters.description: The channel input bus (signal to be multiplied).

parameters.name: Output
parameters.description: The output bus. If 0 (None), the input bus is used as output, and mode is always Replace.
